page.title: 10My House and Its Garden
page.content: My house is about 54 years old. It is built of bricks which are placed in a certain pattern. It is fairly large and has a garden of a third of an acre. The garden used to go right down to the station, but now we have a hedge and there is a house built on the other side of it. In our back garden we have two patios, rose bushes, honeysuckle, four apple trees, a hedge of cypress trees, mint, sunflowers, marigolds, carnations and many other plants. In our front garden we have a patio, a weeping willow, a sycamore tree, rose bushes, a hawthorn hedge and two buddleia trees. My house used to be called "The Sycamore" because of the sycamore tree in the front garden which overhangs the road.
